::Shredder::

Shredder looks at the Destron base in the distance. He opens his comm.

"Magmatron, we're in sight of the Destron base. May we enter?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     He noticed a powerful bots signature, and amazingly it was 
Destron. (Galvatron) He sent a comm encoded only to the Destron 
signal, nobody else could decode it, and if they did, it would come 
out in gibbering incohearent words.
>     The message went like this. "Attention all Destrons. Please 
return to LV-426. We have important matters to discuss, they concern 
the very fate of our faction in these Beast Wars."
>     Magmatron had also recently awakened the sleeping bot in the 
lab. He sent a worker drone to the lab to do some testing....
